author: Staff Reporter
text:
Mahila Court Judge S. Manvizhi sentenced a 57-year-old lorry driver to undergo seven years imprisonment for sexually assaulting a mentally-challenged girl in Tiruchengode in 2014. The prosecution case is that when the 17-year-old girl was alone at home on June 23, 3014, Thangavel of the same area entered the house and sexually assaulted her.

Based on a complaint, the Tiruchengode Rural police registered a case and arrested Thangavel.
title: Man gets seven years jail term
